param.name: telephone
param.label: Telephone
param.description: The SMS notifications will be sent to it.

param.name: role
param.label: Role
param.option: Super User - Full access and control including deleting records
Administrator - Full access and control to all functionality but cannot delete
Auditor - Can enter data related to specific complaints
Resolver - People who are to follow up on messages received
Viewer - Can view messages and stats

param.name: receive_raw_messages
param.label: Receive Raw Messages
param.description: The system will consider this user on random basis when sending notifications. Receiving the notification is possible if checked, but not necessary.

param.name: receive_all_raw_messages
param.label: Receive All Raw Messages
param.description: The system will send notification message to the user.

param.name: receive_processed_messages
param.label: Receive Processed Messages
param.description: The system will consider this user on random basis when sending notifications. Receiving the notification is possible if checked, but not necessary.

param.name: receive_all_processed_messages
param.label: Receive All Processed Messages
param.description: The system will send notification message to the user.
